ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Bolland,Dave Dorman,Geof Darrow,Rick Geary,Grzegorz Rosiński,Andreas Martens,Cosey,Marvano,Jacques Tardi,Brian Bolland,Grzegorz Rosiński,Andreas Martens,Cosey,Marvano,Rick Geary,Jacques Tardi
ComicInfo.Summary:
This issue we continue "Chninkel" by Rosinski and Van-Hamme, as well as Cosey's "Voyage to Italy"! Tardi's classic "The Mad Scientist" with Adele Blanc-Sec continues, as does Schuiten and Peeters' "The Tower" and Haldeman and Marvano's "Forever Wars: Book Two." Also in this issue we continue the supernatural thriller "Rork" and discover more of his origin and his lessons under Tanemanar, the Dream Master, in "The Great Secret!"
*Story Titles* Gazonkas The Great Power of Chninkel Chapter 4: Maelar Rork Passages: The Grey Death part 2 The Voyage To Italy Chapter 4 The Forever War Book Two Chapter Three Joy of Falling The Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: The Mad Scientist Chapter 2
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-16/4000-33936/
